Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Supply Line
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The supply line is a large unarmed, lightly armored cargo transport unit that can only hold a handful of personel but has plenty of organized wracks and shelves to store goods, most of which just being ammuntion or materials for a mech hive.

<color=#FFA500>Has no weapon systems.</color> 

<color=#00ddc0>Requires 2 bandwith, carries up to 1000 units, has minimal armor, is extra weak to most common explosions has four seats for advisory passengers, can turn nearby corpses into chemfuel.</color> 

<color=#FF0000> Hostile Supplylines will nearly never see the front line, but will often be good to crack open for supplies.</color>
